subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
The original form of this character is <big>{{l|zh|𩆼}}</big>, a historical {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant}} of {{l|zh|零}} found in the {{w|Song dynasty}} Chinese dictionary, {{w|Jiyun}} 《{{w2|zh|集韻}}》.

The character <big>{{l|zh|𩆼}}</big> was then erroneously printed as <big>霗</big> ({{l|zh|霝}} mistakenly substituted by {{l|zh|雨}}) in the Japanese {{w|Dai Kan-Wa Jiten}} and subsequently found in {{w|Zhongwen Da Cidian}} <big>《中文大辭典》</big>, a dictionary published in Taiwan from 1962 to 1968 based on the character found in the Japanese {{w|Dai Kan-Wa Jiten}}.

This character can also be found in the {{w|Zhonghua Zihai}} 《{{w2|zh|中華字海}}》 which cites {{w|Jiyun}} 《{{w2|zh|集韻}}》 as its source of reference.
